downloadTitle: Microsoft Windows Server Update Services 3.0 SP2 Release Notes
downloadDescription: These release notes describe the Windows® Server Update Services 3.0 Service Pack 2 (WSUS 3.0 SP2) release, including system requirements, upgrade requirements, and known issues.
detailsSection:
These release notes describe the Windows® Server Update Services 3.0 Service Pack 2 (WSUS 3.0 SP2) release. This document contains the following sections:
What’s New in This Release
System Requirements for the WSUS 3.0 SP2 Server Installation
Configuration Prerequisites and Best Practice Recommendations for the WSUS Server
Windows Small Business Server Prerequisites
System Requirements for the WSUS 3.0 SP2 Remote Console Installation
System Requirements for Client Installation
Upgrade Requirements and Recommendations
Installing WSUS 3.0 SP2
Setup Command-line Parameters for Unattended WSUS 3.0 SP2 Installations
Known Issues
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
